page.title: 09Auckley Guides
page.content: Guides meet in the church hall each Wednesday from 7.15pm-9.00pm.We play all different games & we have patrols. These consist of 6 people,a leader,& a seconder.We have 6 patrols,all named after flowers.We have many trips & each year go to camp. It costs 30p each week. We go on marches through Doncaster & go to church services. The uniform is a blue skirt,hat & blouse.A belt, & an orange neckerchief. You start guides when are 10 & you leave at 15.We do lots of different badges,such as first aid.Some of the badges have to be renewed annually.We also learn about different kinds of knots as well. I like guides & I recomend Auckley guides as they have over 40 members.It is the biggest company in the district.
